metadata.synopsis: Marcus is defeated after having betrayed Isobel.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Load SCL_Main_A.2. Go to -8; 28; 119.3. Approach the checkpoint.4. Start the checkpoint dialogue.5. Continue through the checkpoint dialogue without antagonising Jaheira.6. Continue to -65; 31; 1577. Talk to Marcus.8. In the dialogue with Marcus, don't antagonise him.9. Continue onto the balcony.10. Talk to Isobel.11, End the dialogue with Isobel.12. Dialogue between Isobel and Marcus begins.13. Finish dialogue, enter combat.14. In combat, kill or incapacitate Marcus, while he is in line of sight of Isobel.

0.speaker: Isobel
0.context: NodeContext: hurt and betrayal in her voice. She had to kill a friend who turned traitor.
